name: Battle FROGyale
description:
Fight to become the only frog in the pond on this RIBBITing battle royale!

Move with WASD/arrows
Bite with spacebar/LMB

Made in team with Karl_Jansky (https://karl-jansky.itch.io/, https://twitter.com/Karl_Jansky)

(Audio sometimes dies on web when a lot of stuff is happening, highly recommend to download windows version if you can)
